fields.summary: iOS: Base UI>Window (standalone) - "Nav bar covered" window does not handle device orientation change correctly.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch 1_8_X branch of Kitchen sink on iOS device
2. Navigate to Base UI > Window (standalone) > Open (Nav Bar Visible)

Actual result:
The nav bar is visible in portrait but not in landscape orientation

Expected result:
The nav bar is visible in landscape and portrait orientation
fields.summary: iOS : Window - In KitchenSink > Base UI > Window (standalone) > Open (Nav Bar Visible) the nav bar isn't visible in landscape orientation
fields.environment:
Tested with Ti Studio build 1.0.9.201202131024
Ti Mob SDK 1.8.2.v20120221114636
OSX Lion 10.7.3
iPod Touch OS 4.0.2, iPhone 4 OS 5.0

comments.body:
Issue does not reproduces 

Tested with

Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.1.201212181159
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 
iOS iPhone Simulator: iOS SDK version: 6.0
Closing ticket as the issue cannot be reproduced.
